title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for downloading and running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer that turns any Ollama model into a LangChain LLM or chat model.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and embeddings support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull, and list models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting with Ollama models inside the terminal, written in Rust.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local AI code completion via Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean Next.js chatbot frontend for Ollama with TailwindCSS and Vercel deploy button.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for using Ollama with LangChain, LlamaIndex, AutoGen, vector DBs, and more.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Telegram bot that proxies chats to your local Ollama instance with per-user model selection.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async HTTP and JSON streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, generate, and embeddings endpoints; supports .NET 6+.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models and threads support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, Open WebUI, Nginx, and GPU support.
